title: Ebert & Roeper - 03.16.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  March 16th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0451079/]Horton Hears a Who![/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1023111/]Never Back Down[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443649/]10,000 B.C.[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0808279/]Funny Games[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0842929/]Paranoid Park[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1043838/]Conspiracy[/url]

--- Next few Weeks
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0817538/]Drillbit Taylor[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0478087/]21[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0379865/]Leatherheads[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0451079/]Horton Hears a Who![/url]  -  (renter thumbs) down - down
-- animated
-- voices by - Jim Carrey - Steve Carell - Carol Burnett - etc.

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1023111/]Never Back Down[/url]  -  down - (mindless action) up
-- Sean Faris - Djimon Hounsou - Amber Heard - Cam Gigandet

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443649/]10,000 B.C.[/url]  -  (10,000 pounds of cheese) up - down
-- Camilla Belle

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0808279/]Funny Games[/url]  -  down - (artsy garbage) down
-- Naomi Watts - Tim Roth - Michael Pitt - Brady Corbet

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0842929/]Paranoid Park[/url]  -  (small but very rich) up - down
-- written & directed by Gus Van Sant

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1043838/]Conspiracy[/url]  -  down - down
-- Val Kilmer - Gary Cole

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0783233/]Atonement[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Atonement-Widescreen-Keira-Knightley/dp/B0013XZ6X4/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1205876627&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0461770/]Enchanted[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Enchanted-Widescreen-Amy-Adams/dp/B0011U52EC/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1205876469&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0480249/]I Am Legend[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/I-Am-Legend-Widescreen-Single-Disc/dp/B0013FDM7E/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1205876718&sr=1-2](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0405336/]Southland Tales[/url]  -  down - (abstract crap) down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0426931/]August Rush[/url]  -  down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0484740/]Love in the Time of Cholera[/url]  -  (well intentioned disappointment) down - (guilty pleasure) up

	---Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0200465/]The Bank Job[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up - (big thumbs) up
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0453548/]Snow Angels[/url]  -  (huge thumbs) up - (great film) up
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780536/]In Bruges[/url]  -  (worth a visit) up - (big thumbs) up  -  "make an extra effort to see it"

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/ ]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
[url=http://www.rogerebert.com]Roger Ebert reviews[/url]
[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
-------------------------------------------------
